kw.name: To add the book in the library
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://216.10.245.166/Library/Addbook.php path_url=/Library/Addbook.php headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.4', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, zstd', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '104', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Learn Appium Automation Testing1", "isbn": "abc127694", "aisle": "0019943", "author": "VedAA"}'

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
